title: Fate of the Rose
description: When Ruby James awakens alone in the middle of a desert road called, Solly Avenue, cut up and in pain, she doesn't know what to think. All memories prior to the desert have been erased, or hidden so deep within her mind that they've become useless. Everything is riding on a passerby, which seems less and less promising as the sun begins to set...until headlights appear in the distance. She accepts the ride from her handsome savior, and begins the journey back into the real world.Or so she thinks...Surrounded by familiar faces, lethal dangers, and a new system of laws to abide by, Ruby James will have to dig deeper than ever into a world that she never knew existed to find out what it was that led her there.Will Ruby remember what it was that left her stranded on Solly? Can she recall the memories that threaten to surface with each familiar face? Will she embrace the fate of the rose? But most importantly, will she do it all in time?
author: Victoria Leader
